Name: Jigsaw Puzzle VR
About the game: Procedurally generate jigsaw puzzles from ANY image! Never have to clean off the table before you do a puzzle again. Turn off gravity to assemble puzzles in mid-air. Never worry about missing puzzle pieces. A no stress, high comfort, completely chill game - perfect for playing while listening to podcasts or audiobooks. Comes with 30 puzzles. Users may add any PNG or JPG image to the 'Pictures/JigsawPuzzleVR' folder to have them turned into puzzles the next time the game is launched. Go to the JigsawPuzzleVR subreddit to make bug reports or feature requests!
Meta Title: Jigsaw Puzzle VR: Jun 8, 2021, Silas Marrs and Full Overview
Meta Description: Looking for information on Jigsaw Puzzle VR? Check out the release date (Jun 8, 2021), developer insights from Silas Marrs, and a complete game summary.
